resources.string: Click the settings gear to set date of separation
Click the action button below to enter a deadline in days prior to separation
Enter name of task to do
Enter number of days prior to separation
You need to take a picture first.
this view will hold a picture taken and superimpose text displaying time left in service
This button will share your selfie with superimposed text
select this to set your separation date and branch of service
select to share a snapshot of your countdown
select to start taking pre ets selfies

Thank you for giving Freedom Clock try. If you have any suggestions please go to the play store listing for Freedom Clock and select "email the developer" at the bottom.

 If you haven't already, you can click the settings gear to set your ETS/EAS date and branch of service. Freedom Clock counts to the day after your ETS/EAS, when you actually become a civilian.
 Click the share icon to post a snapshot of your countdown.
 Click the camera icon to take a photo stamped with your remaining days in service.
 Use the "upcoming" feature to enter deadlines given to you in "days prior to separation" and get the date back, then select the entry to "schedule" it in your calendar.
 Lastly, don't forget to set your home screen widget to show your remaining days at a glance.

 Thanks for your service and good luck in your future endeavours.
